column4: and oatmeal raisin cookies are the most delicious desserts I have ever had. This is after returning from Paris
column5: eating Pierre Herme macarons! I want to go and try EVERYTHING now! AND keep in mind that I did not eat these at the store
column6: they were brought back by a friend so I'm eating refrigerated desserts! Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh soooo good! The oatmeal cookie is so soft
column8: and filled with raisin goodness. The fruit tart is beyond any other fruit tart in Houston. I can't even describe the macarons. My favorite is going to be the lemon and pbj. I want more!
